chapters.title: Chapter 37: Darkness in the Tower
chapters.info: Evanellein, p. 578—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah. She is very concerned with her appearance, at least for a Gray. She was one of the sisters who took Siuan Sanche into custody before she was deposed. She was a close confidant of Elaida after she took over. She fled the Tower the day Egwene was raised Amyrlin, though she was not on Verin's list. Egwene suspected that she may have been one Verin missed. She was right: Evanellein was part of Mesaana's attack on the Tower from the World of Dreams. She died at Egwene's hands.
